You can see what other people are gathering, and by extension, what should be available in the pool.  If you're burning through 70g to get something no one else is looking for, you're pretty much guaranteed to get it.  On the other hand if you're trying to find something that 4 people already have 2 Silvers+ of, you're probably not going to find it no matter how many times you re-roll, because it's not in the pool.  Finally, you need to understand your current level and how that relates to the probabilities.  If you've got 2 Silver Vaynes, you want to re-roll a lot after Krugs if possible, because that's when the highest likelihood of of Tier 1 champions is.  On the other hand, if you are trying to get Anivia, you don't want to start re-rolling for her until you're higher level, at least level 6, but really 7 or 8.  She doesn't even have a chance to appear until level 6.

Can you re-roll 70g in the right conditions and still not get what you're looking for?  Sure, but it's not a coinflip.  If you're re-rolling under the right conditions you're much more likely to get what you're looking for.  If not, you may be SOL no matter how much gold you burn through.
